original_text: On arriving there, they gathered the church together and reported all that God had done through them and how he had opened a door of faith to the Gentiles.
korean_text: 그들이 이르러 교회를 모아 하나님이 함께 행하신 모든 일과 이방인들에게 믿음의 문을 여신 것을 보고하고

sentences.original_text: and reported all that God had done through them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 자신들을 통해 행하신 모든 일을 보고하였으며

sentences.original_text: and how he had opened a door of faith
